channel.title: Copy of Digg top 24 hours
channel.description: RSS feed with direct links to popular technology articles. based on superdigg pipe

item.title: [+2469] What BP Doesn't Want You To See From Their Oil Spill (Pics)
item.description: After spilling up to 39 million gallons of oil into the Gulf Coast with 11 BP employee casualties, these are a few pictures of the countless amounts of seabirds caught in the oil slick.

item.title: [+2392] drummer at the wrong gig
item.description: lol, he definitely at the wrong place

item.title: [+2274] Keanu Reeves Gives £50 Million to Unsung Heroes of 'Matrix'
item.description: Man of the moment Keanu Reeves has shown his generosity by giving away £50 million of his earnings from the Matrix sequels. The 38-year-old decided to hand over the money to the unsung heroes.

item.title: [+1934] A personal letter from Steve Martin
[+1826] These are drawings, not photos TRUE STORY
item.description: Believe it or not, these stunning images are not photographs - they were drawn using only one pencil. These incredibly realistic images show the humble pencil at its best, and are so exceptional that they can detail the fine hairs of a cat and the wisps of a beard.

item.title: [+1618] Are Cameras the New Guns?
item.description: In response to a flood of Facebook and YouTube videos that depict police abuse, a new trend in law enforcement is gaining popularity. In at least three states, it is now illegal to record any on-duty police officer.

item.title: [+805] Mr. Bateman, You're Trying to Seduce Me .. Aren't You? (Pic)
item.description: Dustin Hoffman and Jason Bateman just HAD to kiss when they got shown on the jumbotron, right? Um, right.

item.title: [+765] Best Bus Stop Ever [pics]
item.description: Scotland's coziest bus stop would probably be a homeless person's mecca if in the city.

item.title: [+716] Fox News Cuts Glenn Beck Off Mid-Rant (VIDEO)
item.description: Has even Fox News grown weary of Glenn Beck?

item.title: [+714] Has the Supreme Court Decimated Our Right to Remain Silent?
item.description: When is the right to remain silent not a right to remain silent? When you have to speak in order to claim it. That is the bizarre paradox that the Supreme Court, by a 5-4 vote, enshrined in the Constitution, and by doing so, created a gaping hole in the Miranda doctrine — this one backed by what can be described as Alice-in-Wonderland logic.

item.title: [+702] High School Sucks: The Musical [video]
item.description: This is a full clip sneak peek from the full feature film "High School Sucks The Musical" coming to a theater/dvd player to you soon.

item.title: [+695] Hints of life found on Saturn moon
item.description: In 2005, researchers predicted two potential signatures of life on Saturn's moon Titan -- now both have been seen

item.title: [+686] Life Inside The North Korean Bubble [incredible video]
item.description: BBC Newsnight's Sue Lloyd-Roberts experiences first hand North Korea isolation and lack of development on an official trip to view celebrations marking the birthday of the country's founder Kim Il-sung.

item.title: [+674] Duct Tape can Fix Anything (Pics)
item.description: If we were to start looking around us, we would find a world solving every day problems with duct tape. From the mundane tasks to important safety precautions, duct tape has won the world over. An age old saying goes, "Next to a dog, man's best friend is duct tape."
